html:
{{doc.name}}

Accident Declaration Form

Date {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.requested_date or "")}}
Employee ID {{doc.employee_id or ''}} Employee Name {{doc.employee_name or ''}}
Department {{doc.department or ''}} Designation {{doc.designation or ''}}
Resident ID Number(QID) {{doc.resident_id_number or ''}} Date of Joining {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.date_of_joining or '')}}
Nationality {{doc.nationality or ''}} Company {{doc.company or ''}}
Marital Status {{doc.marital_status or ''}} Gender/Age {{doc.gender or ''}}{{"/"}}{{doc.ag or ''}}
{% for det in doc.details_of_injured_person %} {% endfor %}

DETAILS OF THE INJURED PERSON

Name Gender/Age Department Occupation Marital Status Nationality
{{det.name1 or ""}} {{det.gender or " "}}{{"/"}}{{det.age or ""}} {{det.department or ""}} {{det.occupation or ""}} {{det.marital_status or ""}} {{det.nationality or ""}}

DETAILS OF ACCIDENT

Place {{doc.location or ""}} Date/Day/Time {{frappe.utils.format_date(doc.date or "")}}{{"/"}}{{doc.day or ""}}{{"/"}}{{doc.time or ""}}
Circumstance and Description of the accident {{doc.description or ""}}
Name and Address of the persons involved in the accident {{doc.person_involved or ""}}
Name and Address of the witnesses {{doc.witness or ""}}
Nature & Extent of Injury(Or sickness) {{doc.sickness or ""}}
Probable duration of disablement {{doc.probable_duration_of_disablement or ""}}

MEDICAL TREATMENT

Name of Doctor {{doc.doctor_address or ""}} Date {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.held_date or "")}}
Address of the Doctor By whom Treatment was given {{doc.address_of_the_doctor_by_whom_treatment_was_given or ""}}



Date: {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.requested_date or "")}}               Signature of Supervisor:
name: Accident Declaration
